115553.content: Real or Robots it is. Now, what's different about this episode?
115553.title: Real or Robots

choices: When Tommy and Chuckie Wonder if Stu is a Robot
11555311.content: Kimi will be included in the episode. Where do we begin?
11555311.title: Yes

115553111.content:
Late one dark and stormy night at Tommy Pickles' house, Tommy, Chuckie, and Kimi were downstairs watching television. Tommy was dressed in a red shirt and a diaper, Kimi was dressed in a pink shirt and a diaper, and Chuckie was dressed in a lavender pajama shirt and light blue and purple striped pajama shorts. The three toddlers were watching a scary movie where a Mad Scientist replaced all the children's parents with robots.

"At last, my experiment is almost complete! Soon I will replace every man, woman and child with my robots and take over the world!" said the Mad Scientist, and he laughed evilly. Tommy, Chuckie, and Kimi watched in horror as the Mad Scientist brought the robot to life with his lightning ray. The robot stood upright by tipping the bed forward, then gradually started to smile. As the robot began walking towards a door, a Little Boy opened the door and recognized the robot as his father.

"Oh, no! Dad! You're a robot!" The Little Boy shouted. Tommy, Chuckie, and Kimi continued to watch the movie in horror.

What happens next?
115553111.title: The Beginning

115553112.content: Does Kimmy go along with Tommy in this version?
115553112.title: When Tommy and Chuckie Wonder if Stu is a Robot

1155531121.content:
Stu tucked Tommy, Chuckie, and Kimi into Tommy's crib.

"Good night, Chuckie. Good night, Kimi. Your mom and dad will come will come over to get you in the morning." Stu said as he took Chuckie's glasses off and hung them on the crib railings.

"Good night, Tommy. Sleep tight." Stu told Tommy, and he left to go to his bedroom. As he closed the door, Tommy and Kimi stood up and looked outside the bars as Chuckie yawned and put his glasses back on.

"Tommy, Kimi, aren't you sleepy?" Chuckie asked his best friend and little sister.

"No, I'm thinking." Tommy told Chuckie.

"About what?" Chuckie asked Tommy.

"Robots." Tommy told Chuckie.

"Don't think about that, Tommy. You'll get bad dreams!" Chuckie told Tommy.

"I can't help it, because, well, maybe anybody can be robots." Tommy told Chuckie.

"You know, he might be right." said Kimi in agreement.

"Like who?" Chuckie asked Tommy and Kimi.

"Like anybody, Chuckie, like the mailman," Tommy told Chuckie.

"Or the man who sells ice cream," added Kimi.

"Or... or even our own moms and dads!" concluded Tommy.

"What?" Chuckie said as he hid under the blanket.

"Yeah, maybe our real moms and dads have been taken captured to the planet Mars or something!" Tommy told Chuckie.

"No, that can't be true!" insisted Chuckie.

"I don't know, Tommy might be right." Kimi told her brother.

"Yeah, Kimi knows what I'm talking about. Did you see how my dad looked when he turned off the TV? He didn't look like he usually does. He looked like... a... a robot!" Tommy told Chuckie.

"No, Tommy! Stop saying stuff like that! It's not true!" Chuckie said, hiding under the blanket and covering his ears.

"Maybe not, Chuckie, but I can't sleep until I find out for sure!" Chuckie told Tommy.

"Yeah, neither can I!" said Kimi in agreement. Tommy found his screwdriver under his ball and used it to open the crib. He and Kimi climbed out and made their way to Stu and Didi's bedroom.

Does Chuckie follow them?
1155531121.title: Yeah.

1155532.content: Will this be a follow-up to the episode, where Chuckie wonders if Chas is a robot?
1155532.title: Reader's Choice 2

11555321.content: Did Tommy agree to help him figure this out?
11555321.title: Yes

choices: Chuckie Asks Tommy if He Thinks Chas is a Robot
115553212.content:
By morning, the storm had cleared and the sun was rising. Tommy and Chuckie were still asleep in Tommy's crib, and Stu was finally sleeping comfortably in his bed. After such an uncomfortable night sleepwalking due to Tommy and Chuckie thinking he was a robot, Didi decided to let Stu sleep in. She woke up to check on Tommy and Chuckie, when suddenly, the doorbell rang.

"I'll get it!" Didi said, and she walked down to the front door. Chas had arrived to pick Chuckie up.

"Hello, Charles. You must be here to pick Chuckie up."

"Hi, Didi. Thanks for looking after him. I hope he wasn't any trouble." Chas told Didi.

"Oh, you know Chuckie's never any trouble." Didi replied as she led Chas to Tommy's bedroom.

"Is Stu up yet?" Chas asked Didi.

"No, not yet. He didn't get a good night's sleep last night, so I decided to let him sleep in." Didi told Chas. Soon they were in Tommy's bedroom.

"Good morning, Tommy." Didi said as she picked Tommy up out of his crib.

"Good morning, Chuckie." Chas said as he picked Chuckie up.

"Say, Chas, would you mind looking after Tommy today? I have a lot of housework to do and Stu needs his rest." Didi told Chas as she changed Tommy's diaper.

"Not at all, Didi. You know Tommy's always welcome in our house. Besides, I owe you the favor for looking after Chuckie." Chas told Didi. Soon Didi had Tommy dressed in a clean diaper and his light blue shirt.

"Oh, thank you, Charles." said Didi, and she handed Tommy to him.

"Bye-bye, Tommy. Be a good boy for Mr. Finster, okay?" She asked Tommy, who smiled at her. Chas went downstairs to put Tommy and Chuckie in his car and drive them to his house.

What happens next?
115553212.title: Not yet.

115554.content: What will we change about this episode?
115554.title: Special Delivery

11555412.title: No

"I'm looking, Didi! I'm looking!" Lou told Didi. Tommy and Kimi took their diapers off their heads and put them back on their bottoms.

12211111112.content:
Chuckie looked disgusted when he saw his best friend and his little sister wearing their diapers on their heads.

"Tommy, Kimi, I don't think it's a good idea to take your diapers off. What if you have to pee?" Chuckie asked Tommy and Kimi.

Did they have to pee?

"Well, uh, you wear your diaper on your heads!" Tommy said as he pulled down his diaper and put it on his head.

1221111112111.content:
Chuckie began to doubt that Mirrorland was real.

"Wait! How do I know you're not just making this up?" He asked Tommy.

"What do you mean?" Tommy asked Chuckie.

"Maybe we're not even in Mirrorland! Maybe there isn't even a Mirrorland at all!" Chuckie told Tommy.

What happens next?
1221111112111.title: Reader's Choice 1

1221111112112.content:
Chuckie looked disgusted when he saw Tommy wearing his diaper on his head.

"Tommy, I don't think it's a good idea to take your diaper off. What if you have to pee?" He asked Tommy.

Did Tommy have to pee?
1221111112112.title: Reader's Choice 2

12211111121121.content:
"Relax, Chuckie. I'll put my diaper back on." Tommy told Chuckie.

Did Tommy put his diaper back on his bottom before he started peeing?
12211111121121.title: Yes

choices: Try to Hide the Wet Spot
Try to Clean the Wet Spot Up
122111111211212.content:
All of a sudden, Tommy started peeing. He gasped and quickly tried to put his diaper back on. He soon got it back on, but it was too late. There was a big wet spot on the floor.

"Oh, no! What do we do now, Tommy?" Chuckie asked Tommy.

What do Tommy, Chuckie, and Kimi decide to do?
122111111211212.title: No

1221111112112121.content:
"We have to hide it." Tommy told Chuckie. They and Kimi all grabbed Stu and Didi's bedspread and threw it over the wet spot.

"There, that should hide it." Tommy said, and he, Chuckie, and Kimi all ran out of Stu and Didi's bedroom and back to the living room. Later, one of Tommy's parents went into their bedroom.

Who was it?
1221111112112121.title: Try to Hide the Wet Spot

12211111121121212.content:
Didi walked into her bedroom and saw her bedspread on the floor. When she picked it up, she saw the wet spot underneath it.

"Who made this big spot on the floor?" She asked loudly.

"Oh no, Chuckie! My mommy found the big wet spot!" exclaimed Tommy. Didi walked into the living room and saw Spike.

Did she think Spike peed on the floor?
12211111121121212.title: Didi

122111111211212121.content:
"Spike, did you have an accident?" Didi asked Spike. Spike knew he didn't, but he still lowered his head and looked sad, hoping Didi would go easy on him.

Was Didi mad at Spike for allegedly peeing on the floor?
122111111211212121.title: Yes

1221111112112121212.content:
Fortunately for Spike, Didi wasn't mad at him.

"It's okay, Spike. It's my fault for not letting you out." Didi told him reassuringly as she pet his head. She went into the kitchen and let him out through the revolving screen door.

"That was close, Tommy. Your mom thought Spike was the one who had the accident." Chuckie told Tommy, who now felt bad for what he put Spike through.

"Don't worry, Chuckie. Next time, I won't take my diaper off again!" he told Chuckie.

What happens next?
1221111112112121212.title: No

122111111212.content: It was Kimi. Did she think Tommy looked funny wearing his diaper on his head?
122111111212.title: Kimi

1221111112121.title: Yes

131.content:
Link to Wiki Article for Reference: https://rugrats.fandom.com/wiki/Angelica...

What Happens Differently?
131.title: Angelica's Birthday.

choices: She throws a Tantrum about Growing Up
She wears her Party Dress, but still acts like a Baby
1311.content: What does Angelica do Different?
1311.title: Angelica does something different

13113.content: She's nice to the other babies when acting like a baby.
13113.title: SE

131132.content:
Did she strip to her birthday suit right before
she struck the piñata?
131132.title: SE

1311321.content:
As Angelica watched her friends hit the pinata from inside the playpen, she began to regret wanting to act like a baby.

"I'm gonna miss all the chocolates!" She complained.

"By the way, Angelica, you can't have any of those little candies, neither. They're too dangerous for babies." Chuckie told Angelica.

"What? Why?" asked Angelica.

"Well, we might put em' in our nose or something!" Tommy told Angelica.

"Sounds like a few dumb babies have gone and ruined things for everyone! You can't do anything fun! I mean, look at me! I'm sitting here in a diaper, drinking from a bottle!" Angelica complained.

"It may not look like much to you, Angelica, but it's our world, and it's all we know!" Chuckie told Angelica.

"Yeah? Well, I'm not gonna play by your little baby rules anymore! In fact, I'm not even gonna wear these stupid baby clothes anymore!" Angelica told the babies.

Does Angelica take off her bonnet first?
1311321.title: Yes

13113211.content:
Angelica untied her bonnet and angrily tossed it out of the playpen.

What does Angelica take off next?
13113211.title: Yes

131132111.content:
Angelica pulled her shirt up over her head and tossed it aside. Then she untaped her diaper and let it fall to the floor of the playpen. She was now naked.
"Look out, Pinata! Here I come!" shouted Angelica. She jumped out of the playpen and raced towards the pinata. She pushed her friends out of the way, snatched the stick, and with one hit, she knocked all the candy out of the pinata. Everyone stared in shock when they saw Angelica naked.

What happens next?
131132111.title: Her Shirt

1311321111.content: Does Susie tease Angelica for being naked?
1311321111.title: Reader's Choice 1

13113211111.content:
When Susie saw Angelica naked, she laughed at her.

"What's so funny? Angelica asked Susie.

"It's a good thing today's your birthday, Angelica, because you're wearing your birthday suit!" Susie shouted. Everyone laughed at Angelica, who covered her naked body with her arms and blushed in embarrassment.

What happens next?
13113211111.title: Yes

131132111111.content:
When Drew saw Angelica naked, he was not pleased with her.

"Princess, you know better than to take off your clothes, even if they're ones you shouldn't be wearing in the first place. Now go to your room and put your regular clothes back on, or the rest of your birthday party is cancelled!" Drew told Angelica.

Did Angelica do as Drew said?
131132111111.title: Drew Punishes Angelica

1311321111111.content:
"Yes, Daddy." Angelica said sadly, and she walked up to her bedroom to put her regular clothes back on.

What happens next?
1311321111111.title: Yes

131132111112.content: Did Angelica's actions inspire Tommy to take off his own clothes?
131132111112.title: Something Else

1313221.content:
When Tommy, Chuckie, Phil, and Lil saw Angelica dressed and acting like a baby, they began to doubt if she could pull it off.

"Can Angelica really do this?" Chuckie asked Tommy.

"I don't know, Chuckie, but things will sure be different around here if she's gonna be a baby again." Tommy replied.

"Yeah, if she's a baby, she'll be one of us!" Lil said.

"And if she's just one of us, maybe she can't push us around anymore!" Phil exclaimed.

"Or steal or toys anymore!" Lil added.

"Or make us wear those frilly panties!" Chuckie added. Tommy, Phil, and Lil all looked at him in shock upon hearing this.

"Um, I don't want to talk about it." Chuckie told his friends.

132222.content: Could we look at this episode from Tommy's perspective?
132222.title: Something else

1322222.content:
One day at Tommy Pickles' house, Didi put a sweater on Spike. Spike didn't like wearing the sweater. He wimpered miserably as Didi put the sweater on him.

"Oh, now. Don't you look handsome?" Didi said as she pet Spike's head.

"Yikes! Deed, what have you done to Spike?" Stu asked Didi.

"Don't you think he looks cute?" Didi asked Stu.

"Oh, for goodness sake, he's a dog, Deed. Not a... a... a poodle!" Stu complained. Spike growled angrily as he pushed the sweater off.

"Good boy, Spike." Stu said to Spike. Didi, however, was less than pleased. She had spent a long time making the sweater, and Spike didn't even want to wear it.

"Oh, fine, Spike! If you want to run around naked all day, then go ahead!" Didi told Spike angrily.

"Run, Spike! Be free!" Stu told Spike as he jumped into the playpen. Tommy was watching from inside the playpen and was impressed.

"Hey, you two! Come and listen to my acceptance speech, will you?" Lou called to Stu and Didi from the kitchen.

"Ah, sure, Pop." Stu said as he and Didi walked into the kitchen. Tommy walked up to Spike and was impressed when he found out he was naked.

"Wow, Spike! I never noticed before! No wonder you're so happy all the time!" Tommy exclaimed, and he proceeded to undress himself.

What did Tommy take off first?

Tommy pulled his shirt up over his head and tossed it aside. Then he untaped his diaper, sighing with relief as it fell to the floor. He was now naked, just like Spike.

choices: Tommy Suggests that Chuckie Pee on the Tree
14212.content:
Didi dropped Chuckie off in Tommy's backyard, where Tommy, Phil and Lil were playing ball.

"There you go, Chuckie. Have fun!" Didi said, then she went into Tommy's house.

"Hey, how you doin', Chuckeroo?" Tommy asked Chuckie.

"Hi, guys." Chuckie said unhappily as he crouched.

"Um, is something wrong, Chuckie?" Tommy asked Chuckie.

"No." Chuckie said nervously.

"Then why are you sitting on the ground all scrunched up like a old bug?" Lil asked Chuckie.

"No reason." Chuckie said nervously.

"Are you hiding something?" Lil asked Chuckie.

"I'm not hiding anything, I just have to go potty!" Chuckie told Lil.

"So why don't you just go?" Phil asked Chuckie.

"I can't go when people are lookin', and I really gotta go right now, but all the growed-ups are watching me every time I go and I really gotta go!" Chuckie complained.

What happens next?
14212.title: When Chuckie First Has To Pee

choices: Decide to Pee on the Tree
142121.content:
"Hey, Chuckie, I got a idea! Why don't you just go on the tree?" Tommy asked Chuckie.

"Once you're potty-trained, you can't go back to stuff like that!" Chuckie told Tommy.

"Why not? Spike does it all the time!" Tommy told Chuckie as Spike walked up to him. Chuckie had a decision to make. Should he go inside where all the adults can see him, or should he be like Spike and pee on the tree?

What does Chuckie do?
142121.title: Tommy Suggests that Chuckie Pee on the Tree

1421212.content:
Chuckie really had to pee, but he didn't want to go inside Tommy's house where all the adults could see him, so he decided to take Tommy's advice and pee on the tree.

"Oh, all right! I'll use the tree, but you guys gotta not look at me, kay?" Chuckie asked Tommy, Phil, and Lil.

"Okay, don't worry, Chuckie. We'll look at this flower!" Tommy told Chuckie, and he, Phil, Lil, and Spike all looked at a nearby flower.

Chuckie walked up to the tree, and was about to pull down his pants and underwear.

Does Didi come out to check on Chuckie?
1421212.title: Decide to Pee on the Tree

Fortunately for Chuckie, Didi was inside, talking to Chas, unaware of what was going on outside. Chuckie pulled down his pants and underwear and proceeded to pee on the tree, sighing with relief, and then giggling.

What happens next?

choices: Phil and Lil Join Tommy and Chuckie in Peeing on the Tree

Tommy decided to check on Chuckie to see if he peed on the tree. He walked up to Chuckie, and when he saw him peeing on the tree, he was impressed.

"Wow, Chuckie! That looks like fun! I want to try it!" Tommy exclaimed. He then untaped his diaper and let it fall to the ground. Shortly after taking his diaper off, Tommy started peeing on the tree and sighed with relief.

"It feels nice not to need my diapie changed." Tommy said as he continued going pee.

"Come on, guys, you can do it, too! Just try it, it feels great!" Tommy told Phil and Lil.

"I feel better already!" Lil exclaimed as she continued going pee.

14213.content:
After Chuckie sat on the potty but nothing came out, Didi took him back outside.

"Don't worry, honey. We'll try again later." Didi said as she dropped Chuckie off in Tommy's backyard.

"Hey, Chuckie! Did you go?" Tommy asked Chuckie.

"No! The growed-ups were looking at me the whole time and I tried to go but I couldn't and now I don't even got to go no more. I thought you said it was okay to go potty on the tree!" Chuckie told Tommy.

"I'm sorry, Chuckie. It used to be okay." said Tommy.

"Maybe your mommy and daddy changed the rules. There's no splainin' growed-ups." said Lil.

"Well, now I know I'm not doin' that again!" Chuckie said as Spike approached the tree.

"Uh-oh. I guess Spike doesn't know!" said Phil. Tommy gasped when he saw Spike about to pee on the tree.

"Spike, no!" Tommy shouted as he ran at Spike.

"I'm sorry, Spike, but the rules are changed and you're not opposed to go potty on the tree no more." Tommy told Spike, who whimpered nervously.

"Tommy, we can't just tell him not to go potty. Everybody's gotta go sometime." Chuckie reminded Tommy.

"You're right, Chuckie! We gotta teach him a new way to go potty! From now on, I'm gonna be Spike's dad!" Tommy exclaimed.

"Yeah, and I'll be... uh... Spike's other dad!" added Chuckie.

"And we'll be... Spike's Uncle Bill and Aunt Harriet!" added Phil. He and Lil walked up to Spike.

"Here's candy, young Spikey!" said Lil.

"Pull my finger, son!" said Phil.

"Okay, Spike! Let's get started!" exclaimed Tommy. Spike whimpered nervously. He had a bad feeling about this.

What do the babies do?
14213.title: When The Babies Try to Potty-Train Spike

choices: Angelica immitates the babies instead of adults.

1531112.content: Why didn't Tommy like wearing the new puffy diapers?
1531112.title: No

15311121.content:
Tommy didn't like wearing his new puffy diaper because it was too big and bulky. He could hardly stand up or walk around in it. He also couldn't fit his screwdriver inside it.

Did Tommy take off his new diaper?
15311121.title: They Were Too Big and Bulky

choices: Stu or Didi Check on Tommy
153111211.content:
Since Tommy didn't like wearing his new puffy diaper, he decided to take it off. However, because of how big and bulky it was, he couldn't even reach the tapes that held it up to untape it, so he decided to try a different strategy to take it off. He grabbed the front of his diaper and grunted as he pulled on it. Eventually, the tapes came undone and he pulled it off. When he got it off, he sighed with relief.

What happens next?
153111211.title: Yes

info.brief_description: What if The Rugrats went on a different path on any episode of the 9 seasons?
info.description:
There are a some rules that You must obey.


1. keep it clean.
2. Diaper changes are allowed.
3. Nothing rude.
4. Every chapter must be appropriate.
5. Their must never be a mean chapter or it will be deleted.
6. This is the only way the story can stay alive.
7. No Weight gain.
8. If you want to Have the characters get age regressed, You must have excellent grammar with details.
9. No age Progression.
10. Potty training is allowed as well as well as if in alternate episodes that must appropriate.
11. The Rugrats can remove their clothes only if they take a bath or go nakie like in Naked Tommy. But, that must never be inappropriate.
11. This series have had nine seasons. So Keep in that 9 seasoned universe
12. Strange things can happen as well.
13. No age Progression (Which means no all grown up)
14. No Violence or any thing that is wrong.
15. Anywhere around the world is perfect for The Rugrats to go to on adventures.
16. They can meet the thornberrys family again.
17. Have fun!
